text: Va masali kasone, ki amvoli xudro ʙaroi talaʙi xuşnudii Alloh taolo va ʙa xotiri ʙovare, ki dar dilhojaşon [ʙa podoşi Alloh taolo] dorand, infoq mekunand, hamcun ʙūstone ʙar teppae ast, ki ʙoroni tunde ʙar on ʙorad va mevahojaşro ducandon ʙa ʙor ovarad; va agar ʙoroni tunde ham ʙa on narasad, ʙoroni saʙuk [niz zamini pokaşro pursamar mesozad]; va Alloh taolo az on ci mekuned, ogoh ast
